attributes.action: to change to date for  the minimum wage changers to 1st April
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For some reason best know only to the Government the date set by Government to make changes to the amount of Minimum Wage paid is October 1st
How ever the date for increasing Rents, Council Tax changers and the new financial year is the 1st of April so for 7 months the Minimum Wage Work Force have to struggle to pay these increaser's until the New Minimum Wage takes over.
so I am asking you to do the Right thing and move the date for setting and implementing the Minimum wage to 1st April and turn this day of practical jokes to a day of practical living for all.
